title: To restrict any State or local jurisdiction from imposing a new discriminatory tax on cell phone services, providers, or property.
content: Cell Tax Fairness Act of 2008 - Prohibits states or local governments from imposing any new discriminatory tax on mobile services, mobile service providers, or mobile service property for five years after the enactment of this Act. Defines new discriminatory tax as a tax imposed on mobile services, providers, or property that is not generally imposed on other types of services or property, or that is generally imposed at a lower rate.
